column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Now do n't take this the wrong way , but , I ca n't wait for you to leave ! "
#Text=Mako says : " How else is she supposed to take that but the wrong way ? "
#Text=Bolin says : " I mean , because I 've never had a pen pal before !
#Text=" Asami says : " Are you sure you do n't want some company in the Southern Water Tribe ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No ... I appreciate it , but I 'll only be gone a couple of weeks .
#Text=A little time alone will be good for me .
